alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 21 at 2:53AM MST until December 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 to 20 below zero. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Quay County; Roosevelt County
